name: Puzznic
description: Finally it is here! The puzzle game to top all puzzle games. 144 levels of frustration and excitement - that's Taito's latest coin-op hit, Puzznic! A game of fiendish perplexity and diabolical puzzles, Puzznic is set to take the world by storm! Just position the blocks and make them disappear. Sounds easy? Puzznic is a one-player game that is simple in execution and yet amazingly difficult to master. Addictive gameplay as you have never imagined! Get puzzled by Puzznic and be prepared for many long nights of frustration and excitement!
